src/lib/components/DashFeatureImpact.rea.description:
DashFeatureImpact is a component that visualizes ML model feature importance
and their contributions to a prediction, combining distribution, force impact,
and feature table visualizations.

id.description: The ID used to identify this component in Dash callbacks.

features.description: Array of feature objects that contribute to the prediction.

distributionData.description: Array of prediction values used to create the distribution plot.

finalPrediction.description: The final prediction value after all feature contributions.

width.description: Width of the component (number for pixels, string for %, vh).

height.description: Height of the component (number for pixels, string for %, vh).

setProps.description: Dash-assigned callback that should be called to report property changes.

src/lib/components/internal/Distribution.description:
DistributionPlot creates a vertical density plot showing the distribution
of model predictions. The density spreads horizontally while the prediction
values run vertically.

Key features:
- Vertical orientation with prediction values on Y-axis
- Smoothed density calculation using Gaussian kernel
- Current prediction value marker
- Responsive sizing

data.description:
Array of prediction values used to create the distribution.
These should be numerical values representing model predictions.

currentValue.description:
The current prediction value to highlight on the distribution.
This value will be marked with a horizontal line and circle.

height.description:
Height of the plot in pixels.
This should match the parent container's height.

width.description:
Width of the plot in pixels.
This should match the parent container's width.

color.description:
Color for the distribution visualization.
This will be used with varying opacity for the density plot.

src/lib/components/internal/FeatureTable.description:
FeatureTable displays the details of each feature including its name,
value, and contribution to the model's prediction.

features.description: Array of features with their details

onScroll.description: Callback function for scroll position updates

baseValue.description: Starting value before feature impacts are applied

features.description: Array of features with their contribution values

height.description: Height of the plot in pixels

width.description: Width of the plot in pixels

colors.description: Colors for positive and negative impacts

tableScrollPosition.description: Current scroll position of the feature table
